version_description:
Holy smokes! Talk about a debut. We've had a LOT of signups and hundreds of queries - this update addresses some of the most urgent issues you guys have helped us identify. For prep fresh recipes, you'll now only see the ingredients needed for that particular meal and not for the entire week. We've fixed some of the most common error messages. We've heard many requests for keto, veggie and vegetarian, so we're going to get to work on these! If you want a look behind the scenes at the making of the app: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IcXvsNsCCYY

More complete notes on updates:
- When the iOS when the system language is Spanish, fixed bug where "es_" placeholder text was shown to users.
- Fixed problem for "Prep Fresh" meals where the quantity totals were aggregated across multiple days. Now, if a recipe is Prep Fresh it only shows totals for that particular day.
- Fixed problem where sometimes quantities like 40lb Cauliflower would be displayed.
- Fixed size of steps and intro text on iPhone 5/SE (it was far too small).
- Popup for changing Your Partner's days is now better sized on larger iPhones and iPad.
- Fixed a problem where a user might see "Internal Error. Contact support@nibbleapps.com"
- Fixed missing word "to" on email signup page
- Added course information in the calendar (dots) view. This should make it clearer why e.g. you're cooking two different meals for the same days of the week.
- Fixed a bug where sometimes the plan would be changed in Settings but the Weekly and Meal Prep views wouldn't update. Only happened if you went straight to Settings without viewing the Weekly and Meal Prep views.

We've added four new recipes to this version of MealPrepPro. One breakfast and three mains. We've also added a new video which explains how to portion out a meal. This has been a common question we've received. At the bottom of the recipe, where we list nutritional information, you'll now see a note that this is per serving. This update also has a bunch of recipe tweaks.

For new users, we've been listening to your feedback and we now have a better explanation of how the 7 day free trial works. We've also made it easier to manage your subscription from the Settings screen.

We're really excited to keep improving MealPrepPro and we'll be sharing more updates soon!

If you're nearing the end of a 4-week section of your plan, tap past the last day or week. We've added a new screen where you can continue your same plan for another 4 weeks. This means you can now get the next part of your plan in advance.

Want to cut your meal prep time by 1/4? Grab this update to MealPrepPro and get our new 5 minute meals. We've tested it and for most users, their meal prep time will come down by 25%. Also, to help you better plan your week, you can now sort recipes by the quickest prep time.

Want to be notified when we add new recipes or features? You can now enable this in the Settings.

Important announcement: for users on our standard plan, the next plan you create will have snacks which make up 10% of your daily calories. Previously it was 25%. We felt the 10% was a more natural snack size and it's already the size for snacks on Keto and Plant-Based meal plans.

So. Many. Updates!
1. 20 new recipes with a prep time of 10 minutes or less. Want to see a particular new recipe? Reach out and we'll do our best to accommodate requests. We're working on additional breakfasts and snacks!
2. New recipe videos - we've added additional recipe videos for the cooking mode.
3. We've also spent a fair bit of time looking at ingredient rounding - this should make the ingredient list easier to follow.
4. 3D Touch - you can now 3D touch on the app icon to go directly to your shopping list and add water to your water tracker.
5. Non-destructive plan editing - previously, whenever a change was made to the calories or to your partner's details, you'd be given a new 4 week plan. The app now simply adjusts your current plan.
6. We've made a number of tweaks and improvements to our plant-based recipes.

We’ve been hearing from adventurous MealPrepPro users who want the flexibility of being able to choose recipes that are not in their plan. For example, if you are on the standard plan, you also occasionally want to have a plant-based meal. Or if you are on the plant-based meal plan and you want to have meat on a Saturday. You gotta do you and in this update we've added that flexibility as an option.

Version 1.9 brings major improvements to the shopping list. You can now view your groceries by recipe and remove individual recipes. We've also added sharing so you can share the list with whoever is in charge of shopping today. Big thank you to everyone who shared their feedback about how the shopping list works.

For anyone on our standard meal plan, we've added 10 new snacks.

You now have even more recipes to choose from! This update includes 29 new recipes across the MealPrepPro plans.

We've also made our new shopping list even better, adding subtitles for certain ingredients to help you while you are in the store. We've also fixed a rare issue with restoring an active subscription.

I hope you're enjoying the updates and don't forget to reach out to us at any time!

In accordance with the new GDPR legislation, we're giving all MealPrepPro users improved privacy control. It's now easier to delete your account and data, change your email and password and export your data. We've updated our privacy policy to reflect these changes and to make it clearer how your data is collected and used.

MealPrepPro continues to grow with exciting new recipes. In this update we've added 19 new meals across the plans. Keep your eyes peeled for an additional 15 new recipes which we're adding the finishing touches to now.

This update brings you 12 new standard plan recipes and 4 new keto recipes.

We also have an exciting announcement to make about MealPrepPro version 2. This is due out at the end of the month and will bring major improvements to everything from the way you swap recipes to how you customize your plan.

This update brings you 12 new standard plan recipes and 4 new keto recipes.

This update brings you 12 new standard plan recipes and 4 new keto recipes.

We also have an exciting announcement to make about MealPrepPro version 2. This is due out at the end of the month and will bring major improvements to everything from the way you swap recipes to how you customize your plan.

Welcome to the all new MealPrepPro 2.

Allergy support - From egg to gluten, MealPrepPro now has meal plans that can adapt to the most common allergies.
Your favorites - When you tap swap you’ll see a new button for browsing your favorite recipes.
New skip button - Need to skip a day? Or skip a meal? We've added a handy new skip button.
New meal plans - Aside from standard, keto and plant-based, you can now pick a pescatarian or a vegetarian plan.
New recipes - We've added 27 new recipes

We hope you enjoy all the new features - thank you for your support!

Two weeks, two big updates. Last week we brought allergy friendly meal plans to MealPrepPro, along with vegetarian and pescatarian plans.

This week, when you tap "Swap" you'll notice a new button to access your favorite recipes. As the number of recipes inside the app keeps growing, this is really handy for quickly finding your go-to meals.

We've also improved the way the shopping list works, by adding weight information for certain items. For example, you'll no longer see just 2 sweet potatoes but the app will also specify the weight (476g/16.8oz).

Finally, we're celebrating 12 months in the App Store as MealPrepPro turns 1 years old. Thank you for all your support and reviews!

Happy New Year from MealPrepPro! Here's what's new:
1/ Make 2019 your best year yet, with our habit change series delivered weekly to your inbox.
2/ Check your daily plan, see your calories & macros and track your water intake - all now available in the updated MealPrepPro Watch app.
3/ Discover 6 new recipes

Someone *cough* Andreas *cough* forgot to add fancy new screenshots for our big Apple Watch update. We've added these in now and updated our FAQ to reflect all the great new things you can now do with MealPrepPro on the Apple Watch.

We've added haptic feedback and animations that spark joy! We've also made some behind the scenes changes to our subscriptions, which will allow us to bring you some exciting new features in the coming months. (Haptic feedback is available on iPhone 7 and above.)

We've reduced the size of the app by around 35mb by further compressing the recipe pictures.

Fixed a bug when using MealPrepPro on a second device for the first time. Previously, if the app was installed on a new device, it could overwrite the existing, synced meal plan with a brand new plan. Big thank you to the user who reported the issue!

Fixed bug where on iPad after swapping a meal, the macro rings weren't updated.

Portion calculator now allows you to enter decimal numbers.

Whilst you can't beat the accuracy of a kitchen scale for hitting your calories and macros, we know that the best meal plan is the one that you can easily follow. MealPrepPro now lists both the weight and cup measurements for ingredients, saving you time in the kitchen.

New Recipes: We've focused on overnight oats in this delicious update to MealPrepPro that brings 17 new recipes.
Net Carbs: If you are a keto user you'll now see Net Carbs instead of Total Carbs. Once you generate a new keto plan, the app will switch to the new measurement.
Recipe Tweaks: We periodically review nutritional data in our database and update our recipes according to the latest information. You may notice some small tweaks to recipes.

Happy holidays! For our final update of 2019 we've added 22 new recipes including our No Bake Protein Balls, Chickpea Tofu Power Bowl and Keto Bacon Wrapped Chicken. In January we're launching our all new Mediterranean plan. This is the first of a number of new plans we'll be bringing to MealPrepPro in 2020. 

This update also brings the ability to Sign in with Apple on iOS 13. Finally, we now support shellfish allergies.

Happy new year! Kick off 2020 on our new Mediterranean meal plan. Voted the best diet in the world by nutrition experts - it’s easiest to stick to long term, best for weight loss and great for heart health. Check it out to see if it’s the plan for you.

We improved some of our recipes (sorry for the missing hummus!). We also improved our 4-week check in. You can now choose to either have a new 4-week plan or repeat your last 4 weeks. Finally, we also made some tweaks to our subscription management page to make it clearer.

We want to make MealPrepPro recipes as easy to follow as possible. That’s why all ingredients are now listed in the order they are used in a recipe. It’s one of the small ways we’re working to make your next meal prep easier than the last!

You can now browse favorites from all the MealPrepPro plans, not just the plan you are currently on.

At the top of the daily tab you now see Yesterday, Today or Tomorrow instead of today's date. You can tap in the middle of the bar to quickly return to today.

At the top of the weekly tab you now see This week or Next Week instead of the week's dates. You can tap in the middle of the bar to quickly return to this week.

We want to make every part of your weekly meal prep easier. Today, we're introducing an improved recipe screen that makes following MealPrepPro recipes easier than ever before. We know that we eat with our eyes first and beautiful recipe photography can inspire you to cook delicious, healthy meals. That's why we're bringing bigger recipe photography to MealPrepPro. Starting with our low carb plan, we'll be gradually introducing the new larger photos across all MealPrepPro plans.
